Detailed Description

template<typename Var>
struct WatchNotInRangeConstraint< Var >

constraints;w-notinrange Description The constraint w-notinrange(x, [a,b]) ensures that x < a or b < x. constraints;w-notinrange References See also

help constraints w-inrange

Definition at line 112 of file dynamic_notinrange.h.

template<typename Var>
virtual bool WatchNotInRangeConstraint< Var >::get_satisfying_assignment ( box< pair< int, DomainInt > > &  assignment  )  [inline, virtual]

Looks for a valid partial assignment to a constraint.

The return value (in the box) is pairs of <varnum, domain value>, where varnum is in the same position as returned by get_vars.
